name: Heart of Texas Community Health Center INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Heart of Texas Community Health Center INC is a Clinic/Center  Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC) provider based in Waco, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $92.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $92.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
